items.name: Brainstorming
items.description: Do you have a technical problem that needs a solution? Talk to one of our experts, a seasoned professional to discuss your ideas.

items.name: Design
items.description: Choose from experienced graphic designers to cover all design requirements for your brand.

items.name: Legal
items.description: Get legal advice, support, and trademark protection according to the country and region where you plan to sell your product.

items.name: Prototyping
items.description: Create a sample or prototype, and test its feasibility and functionality before starting mass production.

items.name: Manufacturing
items.description: Find reliable factories where you can produce in high quality and for a reasonable price.

items.name: Sales & Distribution
items.description: Are you ready to go to market? Connect with sales and distribution specialists in your niche and on the targeted markets.

items.name: Marketing
items.description: Create the most suitable strategy and marketing plan for your brand with step-by-step execution.

items.name: Packaging
items.description: Build beautiful, functional and practical packaging that displays your invention in the best possible light.

items.name: Web & App
items.description: Custom-built or template based, build the website that fits your budget and caters precisely to your requirements.

items.name: Communication
items.description: Are you ready to go to market? Connect with sales and distribution specialist in your niche and on the targeted markets.

items.name: Social Medias
items.description: Get noticed, stay connected and find influencers to help to promote and sell your product.

items.name: Project management
items.description: From idea to market, experienced professionals bring your project to successful completion.

items.name: Crowd Funding
items.description: Develop and run a successful campaign for your brand with targeted pre-campaigns and after campaign follow-ups.

items.name: Purchasing
items.description: Are you looking for new and exciting products on the market? Connect with inventors and creators in your niche to find the products you need.

items.name: Logistic
items.description: Arrange all your shipping, customs, and logistics related administration through experienced and reliable professionals.

items.name: Fundraising
items.description: You have a perfect idea but it needs funding? Find investors to help you to make your product a reality.
